name: Block Jump (Hamdaan Khan)
description: Get ready for the ultimate platformer jumping game. You have to reach the coin and win the game. But wait...there's a catch! You only have limited jumps to complete the level. Play this strategic platformer game now and see if you have what it takes to make it till the end and reach the coin. Stay tuned for customizable cubes, power ups and much more in the coming updates. Are you up for the challenge?
